quest.start: Oh, hello there...=>Uhm...I haven't seen you here before, who are you?=>Well, to be honest, it doesn't matter. Not in this place.=>My name is... uhm... Dick, but I don't really like it. Call me Richard.=>You seem lost... You know what? If you can prove you can be of any use, then we'll talk.=>Can you please bring me some wood for the campfire? Here's an axe, it'll help you.
quest.complete: Thanks a lot, stranger.=>I'd like to know your name now...=>Nice to meet you, {PLAYER}!=>Hm... Okay. I'll take my axe back. If you want some job or a good story, just ask!

quest.start: Hello, {PLAYER}!=>You know, our camp gets raided by Marauders pretty frequently. But now that you appeared out of nowhere, I've got a strange feeling that we have a chance against them!=>Go kill 10 rookie marauders
quest.complete: Thank you, hero! Take your reward and return to me when you are ready for the next task.
quest.requirement_str: Kill 10 marauders and give me 10 leather pieces you get from them.
